movies.title: Red Line
movies.plot: Terrified commuters are on the ride of their lives when terrorists send a subway train speeding out of control during rush hour. With the saboteur among them, a group of citizens are now trapped underground and in a race against time if they hope to see daylight again. Full of fast-paced action and suspense, Redline is a thriller that will have you holding on for safety.
movies.simplePlot: A Los Angeles subway train is brought to a slamming stop, the tunnel partially collapsed, and several people injured. The survivors must figure out what caused it, and must deal with the greater danger that soon faces them.

biography.bio: Nicole Gale Anderson was born on August 29, 1990 in Rochester, Indiana, USA. She is an actress, known for Beauty and the Beast (2012), Jonas (2009) and Red Line (2013).
biography.name: Nicole Gale Anderson

biography.bio: John Billingsley was born on May 20, 1960 in Media, Pennsylvania, USA. He is an actor, known for Star Trek: Enterprise (2001), The Man from Earth (2007) and White Oleander (2002). He is married to Bonita Friedericy.
biography.name: John Billingsley

biography.bio: Kunal Sharma was born on December 12, 1987 in Andover, Massachusetts, USA. He is an actor, known for Prison Break: Sequel (2017), The Kids Are All Right (2010) and It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia (2005).
biography.name: Kunal Sharma

biography.bio: Waylon Kevin Sizemore is a small town guy who continues to stay true to his roots. Born and raised in the small town of Princeton, WV to a middle class family and one older brother, Sizemore was cast in a Maxwell House Coffee commercial his senior year of high school, and knew at that point he wanted to be an actor. He attended The Art Institute of Pittsburgh and received a degree in communications while moonlighting as an extra on films. After graduation, Sizemore lived in 5 states in 5 years doing plays, commercials and learning as much as he could about the business. The summer after studying at the American Academy of Dramatic Arts, he decided to make Los Angeles his home away from home. On the small screen, Sizemore is known as Anthony, the US Air Marshall on the Emmy nominated series Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (2015), as well as the hot headed Gary Humphrey on the series Resurrection (2014). He's created many memorable characters on shows such as Rizzoli & Isles (2010), Under the Dome (2013), Drop Dead Diva (2009) and Weeds (2005) to name a few. On the big screen, Sizemore is remembered as the energetic Coach Jerry Stearns from the football movie Woodlawn (2015). Over the years, Kevin has gained a reputation for playing characters with a checkered past and individuals who are emotionally wounded that struggle to find peace within, he also has a unique ability to have audiences love to hate his characters. In 2016, Trew Calling (2016) marked the first feature that he co-produced under GKg Productions. Since then, he has co-produced the action adventure indie film Hospice (2017) and the holiday film Believe (2016). Kevin is married to Gina Lombardi Celebrity Personal Trainer, Author of the Deadline Fitness and TV Host. Their son, actor Gunnar Sizemore is known for his role as Micah Brenner on Nashville (2012) and many voice characters for cartoons.
biography.name: Kevin Sizemore

biography.bio: Joe Williamson is an actor, known for Grey's Anatomy (2005), Looking (2014) and In-Lawfully Yours (2016).
biography.name: Joe Williamson

biography.bio: Mark Saul was born on June 20, 1985 in Los Angeles, California, USA as Mark Adam Saul. He is known for his work on Grey's Anatomy (2005), The Social Network (2010) and Parks and Recreation (2009).
biography.name: Mark Saul

biography.bio: Classically trained in both drama and dance, Keena Ferguson has performed in a vast array of TV guest roles on many hit TV shows including those such as, Two in a Half Men - (CBS), Gortimer Gibbon's Life on Normal Street - (Amazon), and in last year's breakout hit for FX, Atlanta. Keena's television work experience also includes co-hosting The Way We Do It on BET with comedian Ricky Smiley. Keena's filmography includes a star billed role in the theatrically released action-packed thriller, Red Line, a supporting lead opposite Stephen Dorff in the screwball dramedy feature , American Hero,, indie drama, Daughter of Fortune, and stylized digital action feature, Forever No More. Keena Ferguson's achievements in legitimate stage productions include clinching the prestigious 2016 NAACP Award for Best One Person Show. In addition to her acting and dancing passions, Keena is an accomplished writer and producer. Her current project, the docuseries From the Fly gives viewers a chance to take a bird's eye view of regular people actively pursuing their dreams. Previous films produced by Keena have screened at 35 international film festivals and been picked up for television distribution and garnered multiple awards including the HBO Shorts Series at the Martha's Vineyard African American Film Festival.
biography.name: Keena Ferguson

biography.bio: Born in San Diego, CA in 1999, Renee began acting at age 8 after being approached by a talent scout in a shopping mall. She loves to perform and develop characters, and is a natural in front of the camera or an audience. Along with her continuous acting classes and workshops, Renee studies piano and voice. She enjoys arts & crafts, fashion, music, and writing stories. A voracious reader and excellent student, Renee has performed in live theatre, commercials, industrial videos, and student films. Red Line is her first feature film. She resides in San Diego with her parents and older brother.
biography.name: Renee Sly

biography.bio: Kym Jackson was born on July 1, 1981 in Bath, England as Kimberley Anne Jackson. She is an actress and producer, known for This Is Us (2016), Rebel (2017) and The Good Nanny (2017).
biography.name: Kym Jackson

biography.bio: From the Maganini ancestors, Anna Maganini inherits a legacy of one or two macaroni factories from Chicago to Tacoma. From her salsa-loving mom, a Spanish gramma who married an Indian in the steamy Panama jungles. Anna grew up in the Canal Zone, Panama, an American jungle oasis, with lots of beaches, sunshine, palm trees, jungle monkeys, and Carnival time. She has a B.A. in Dance and English Lit, and a Masters in TV Broadcasting. She worked as a TV reporter before moving to Los Angeles and catching the acting bug. Her TV credits include "Dexter", "The Mentalist", "Medium", "Numbers", "The West Wing", "Close To Home".
biography.name: Anna Maganini

biography.bio: Jamie Nieto was born in Seattle, Washington. Nieto was raised as an only child in a single parent home in Sacramento, California. Nieto is an Actor, 2-time Olympian, and former professional Track and Field Athlete. Nieto is a 2-time Olympic finalist and was ranked in the top 10 in the world on more than one occasion. After high school, Nieto attended Sacramento City College, and Eastern Michigan University where he earned a full scholarship in athletics. Nieto is a 4-time National Champ, 3-time World Champ Team Member, 3-time Pan Am Team Member, 3-time All American, indoor and outdoor school record holder, and was inducted into Eastern Michigan's Hall Of Fame in 2012. Nieto's professional career as a High Jumper has taken him to over 35 different countries around the world. Nieto has been ranked in the top ten in the nation by United States Track and Field since 1998. After retiring in 2013 Nieto started coaching at UCLA and then University of Southern California, but decided to pursue his childhood love for movies, acting, producing, and writing. Nieto started vigorously working on his craft in 2007, by doing shorts films, student films, commercials, features and taking acting classes. Nieto did his first feature film in 2009 and since has starred and has been featured in 5 others films to date. Nieto's first starring role in a feature film was "The Encounter" (on Netflix). Other film credits include: Kontrast, Jerusalem Countdown, Red Line, and Baseball's Last Hero; The Roberto Clemente Story where Nieto is playing the lead role of Roberto Clemente. Nieto has also guest starred on Family Time, and produced and award winning pilot called Blood Brothers and a web-series dedicated to interviewing Olympic athletes called "Holla Atacha Boy" that has over 100 shows. Nieto's passion and drive for success is uncanny. Nieto stays busy with coaching, track camps, writing, producing, and acting.
biography.name: Jamie Nieto

biography.bio: Lauren's story is one of transformation. Born in Kansas City, Missouri she showed an interest in the arts from an early age. She was a published poet by the age of ten and attended the University of Missouri-Kansas City's summer playwriting course on scholarship when she was fourteen. She later studied Classical Music Composition and Piano at the University. After college her career goals went in a completely different direction. She moved to San Diego in 1998 and immediately met her partner and future wife, local commercial photographer Elsa Flores. Together they built and ran Photo by Elsa, a successful photography and graphic design firm for ten years. Near the end of their fourteen year relationship Lauren began undergoing a transformation which can only be described as life-altering. Selling nutritional supplements for additional income, Lauren chose to use her favorite quote, "You must be the change you wish to see in the world," ~ Mahatma Gandhi, to be the guiding principle in her business. This became the catalyst on her journey toward a healthier lifestyle and ultimately led her back to her true passion. Acting. "My journey has blessed me with the ability connect to other's in a healing way and doing so is deeply fulfilling for me." ~Lauren Holiday Lauren lost 65 lbs over the course of a year and found the courage and confidence to begin her life over as an actress, voice over artist, and stand-up comic. She quite literally is a late bloomer, finding her voice as an artist again in her thirties. As an incest survivor, Lauren recently joined the RAINN Speaker's Bureau as a speaker and advocate for victims of rape, abuse and incest. Lauren spent four years doing stand-up comedy in San Diego, and Los Angeles and studied Improv with local San Diego troupe Roar Theatre as well as Second City. "Stand-up has been amazing for me. It gave me the courage and toughness to handle anything, and the agility to be prepared for it." ~Lauren Holiday She has been in dozens of local, regional, and national commercials and has a growing film and television resume.
biography.name: Lauren Holiday
